title: Crash Zone: No News is Good News
creator_contributor_role: Australian Children's Television Foundation, production company
abstract: 'Crash Zone' Series 1, Episode 8. Five radically different kids score part-time jobs testing new computer games. It's a blast, but more than computer programs get tested.
description: The kids are alone at Catalyst and having a great time when Kimberley arrives. She's a news reporter, there to do a story on the testers. Mike is flattered but the other kids begin to suspect she's a spy. Pi finally succeeds in getting rid of Kimberley only to find her own mother has tracked her to Catalyst. Pi's unmasked. Now everybody knows she's a rich kid. Stars Frances Wang as Bec, Damien Bodie as Ram, Cassandra Magrath as Pi, Paul Pantano as Marcello, Nikolai Nikolaeff as Mike and Nicki Wendt as Alex.
